awd_titl_txt: Guide To Graduate Education in Science, Engineering,        and Public Policy
awd_abstract_narration: This action provides funding to the American Association for               the Advancement of Science (AAAS).  Funds provided by this award                will support preparation and dissemination of an updated                        directory of graduate programs in science, engineering and public               policy (SEPP).  The current directory resulted from a partially                 NSF-funded AAAS survey of such "SEPP" programs six years ago.  It               is also the only such directory in existence.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics.

inst.inst_name: American Association for the Advancement of Science
